channel.description: Study points for the exam RHCSA exam candidates should be able to accomplish the tasks below without assistance. These have been grouped into several categories. Understand and use essential tools Access a shell prompt and issue commands with correct syntax Use input-output redirection (>, Â», |, 2>, etc.) Use grep and regular expressions to analyze text Access remote systems using SSH Log in and switch users in multiuser targets Archive, compress, unpack, and uncompress files using tar, star, gzip, and bzip2 Create and edit text files Create, delete, copy, and move files and directories Create hard and soft links List, set, and change standard ugo/rwx permissions Locate, read, and use system documentation including man, info, and files in /usr/share/doc Create simple shell scripts
